catalog.name: ROMS simulations of river-sourced coastal ocean tracer pathways following Hurricane Florence and synthetic scenarios

dataset.name: ROMS simulations of river-sourced coastal ocean tracer pathways following Hurricane Florence and synthetic scenarios

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - ROMS simulations of river-sourced coastal ocean tracer pathways following Hurricane Florence and synthetic scenarios(d583114)

metadata.documentation: Three-hourly model output from a 800 m horizontal resolution 50-vertical layer Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS) simulation of the coastal region near Cape Fear, North Carolina during Hurricane Florence, which made landfall in North Carolina in September 2018,. This output is being made public in connection with a publication (Moulton et al., 2024). Also included are model setup files and scripts necessary to rerun the model.
